name: Zionen
description:
Tragedy has stricken a mining colony in the Kuiper Belt! You've been tasked by the Zionen corporation to investigate the disaster, and discover why the colony collapsed.

Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrow keys

Jetpack - Hold Spacebar

Credits:

Programming by Arthur Gan and Alex Ngo

3D Modeling by Nathan Green

Narrative Design by Lucas Immanuel

Game Design by Nathan Green and Lucas Immanuel

Sound Design by Arthur Gan

-in collaboration with-

Studio Digs 3 Day Game Jam
